function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Concentration of attention on economic and business concerns","Impact":"Neglect of non-financial impacts such as ecological and social factors","Mitigation":"Increasing awareness and consideration of non-financial impacts in decision-making processes","Technologies":"Data analytics and modeling to assess non-financial impacts","People":"Decision-makers, policymakers, and analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Threat to sustainable development and UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)","Impact":"Impediment to achieving the SDGs by 2030, particularly in developing nations","Mitigation":"Allocating resources for sustainable development initiatives, promoting technological and infrastructural advancements, and fostering international cooperation","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, sustainable agriculture practices, and digital infrastructure","People":"Communities in developing nations, international organizations, and policymakers","Owner":"International aid organizations, government agencies, and non-governmental organizations"},{"Description":"Rise in global poverty due to COVID-19 economic shutdown","Impact":"Increase in the number of people pushed into poverty, exacerbating social challenges and inequality","Mitigation":"Implementing economic rescue packages, supporting vulnerable economies, and addressing social ills such as health, conflict, and inequality","Technologies":"Financial aid platforms, digital payment systems, and poverty mapping tools","People":"Vulnerable communities, world leaders, and aid organizations","Owner":"International aid organizations, government agencies, and financial institutions"}]}
